landing.title:
Stop Drowning in Tabs.
Build Stronger Relationships.
landing.subtitle: All important profiles of competitors, partners, and customers on a single screen. No ads, no distractions.

painPoint1.title: Lost in Newsfeed
painPoint1.description: Facebook/LinkedIn algorithms hide posts from important people if you don't interact regularly.
painPoint1.solution: Partner Center scans profiles directly, ensuring you never miss news from business-critical contacts.

painPoint2.title: Time Waste
painPoint2.description: Spending 2 hours daily scrolling through 5 social networks just to check what 20 partners/customers are doing.
painPoint2.solution: Just 5 minutes on Partner Center's focused Newsfeed. Time saved = Money earned.

painPoint3.title: High Cost
painPoint3.description: Bulky Social Listening systems cost $200+/month, too expensive for individuals and SMEs.
painPoint3.solution: A lean, "just enough" tool with pricing starting from just $5 - $10/month.

painPoint4.title: Missed Opportunities
painPoint4.description: You know customers posted, but don't know what to say, or miss when they're showing buying signals.
painPoint4.solution: AI Ice Breaker suggests response templates, and AI Sales Signals alerts you instantly when purchase intent is detected in posts.
